summary: You can summon 23 Mounts(Silt Strider, Chagohod,Fat/Spectral Dragons,Flying Shoggoth,Dwarven Charger and Page,Seeker,Lurker,Cave worm,Ashhopper,Bristlebacks,Riekling,Spider,Netch,Flame/Frost/Storm Spirits)wherever you want + you can find 18 Followers in FALKREATH.THE DLC DRAGONBORN IS REQUIRED
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"]Dragonborn - Mounts and Followers [/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]version 2.9

Optional Files: Esp 2-9BIS -English- NO FOLLOWERS + Esp Version Française[/color]

With this mod you can summon 23 Mounts/Followers (Silt Strider Tamed*, Chagohod Armored Falmer, Fat Dragon Black, Flying Shoggoth, Dwarven Charger, Dwarven Page, Seeker, Lurker, Cave Worm, Ash hopper, Armored Bristleback, Boar/Bristleback/Warthog, Boar/Bristleback Riekling, Riekling, Spiders, Netch, Spectral Dragon, Flame Spirit, Frost Spirit, Storm/Ash Spirit) wherever you want + you can find 18 Companions/Followers (Armored Bristleback, Ash hopper, Boar/Bristleback/Warthog, other Boar/Bristleback Riekling, Rieklings, other Spiders, Young Netch, Werebear , Weredovahbear , Miraak, Dwarven Ballista, Cave Worm, Lurker, Seeker , Ahzidal -acolyte Dragon Priest-) in Falkreath (Inside and outside just near the gates).

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dragonborn Mounts"

*In the game, you have "Dusty", but you can't mount it ![url= http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6viiXrKCdDM] Skyrim Dragonborn DLC - Last Silt Strider of Morrowind [/url]

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dh6zzBZ.gif[/img]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=680634DragonbornmountsFollowers3.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/680634DragonbornmountsFollowers3.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=373030MountflamespiritFollowerarmoredbristleback2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/373030MountflamespiritFollowerarmoredbristleback2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=713113summondragonbornmountsfollowers.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/713113summondragonbornmountsfollowers.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

1) The DLC DRAGONBORN is required

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

2)[size="7"][color=#ff0000] You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "[/color][/size]

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 24 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

4) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXX” and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dragonborn Mounts", at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (30' for the Silt Strider Tamed, 15' for the Dragon, the Frost Spirit and the Storm Spirit)

5) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=145488MountflamespiritFollowerarmoredbristleback1.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/145488MountflamespiritFollowerarmoredbristleback1.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=917208followerweredovahbearmountboarriekling1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/917208followerweredovahbearmountboarriekling1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) YOU CAN'T SUMMON the Fat Dragon Black in a Town (Whiterun,etc...) ,a house or a dungeon... and in some places ! ...IF YOU CAN'T SUMMON, TRY ANOTHER LOCATION (this summon require lots of space)...


If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=752393chagohodarmoredfalmer1.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/752393chagohodarmoredfalmer1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Credits[/color]

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]maymay1588[/color] for the mesh of the weredovahbear in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30638 ]Dovahbear Companion [/url] by maymay1588 and zeroeternalz

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn[/color] for the meshes of the Chagohod Armored Falmer, the Silt Strider Tamed, the Fat Dragon Black, the Flying Shoggoth, the Dwarven Charger, the Dwarven Page, the 3 Spirits, in his mod: [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource[/url]

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/39159/?]Mr. Dave[/url] for the mesh and the textures of the Armored Bristleback

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=791002followerboarrieklingmountspectraldragon.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/791002followerboarrieklingmountspectraldragon.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.gamemodding.net/ru/skyrim/skyrim-companions/44883-summon-dragonborn-mounts-and-followers.html] Russian site gamemodding.net[/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=871166followerspidermountnetch.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/871166followerspidermountnetch.jpg[/img][/url]

files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 2.9: Adds a Chagohod Armored Falmer

New in the version 2.8.1: A bug fixed, Now you can summon the Silt Strider everywhere you want !

New in the version 2.8: You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dragonborn Mounts"
